mapper.select: select o.id as unit_id, (select count(1) as dangers from owner_unit_danger ud1 where ud1.unit_id = o.id and ud1.status = '0' ) as rectifications, (select count(1) as dangers from owner_unit_danger ud2 where ud2.unit_id = o.id and ud2.status = '1' ) as reexaminations, (select count(1) as dangers from owner_unit_danger ud3 where ud3.unit_id = o.id and ud3.status = '2' ) as finishs, (select count(1) from owner_unit_danger t where t.unit_id = o.id and t.status != '9' and t.status != '' ) as dangers from owner_unit o where o.id = #{unitId} limit 1
